title: Dansai Bunri no Crime Edge (The Severing Crime Edge)
synopsis: Kiri Haimura has an obsession with beautiful hairâ€”specifically, cutting it. This bizarre trait is what leads him to seek out a rumored long-haired ghost who lives in an abandoned house on a hill. However, he finds not a ghost, but a beautiful girl with long flowing hair named Iwai Mushanokouji, the "Hair Queen," whose hair cannot be cut due to a family curse.
